original_text: He destroys powerful people, and he chooses other people to take their place. He does not have to ask them anything. korean_text: 세력 있는 자를 조사할 것 없이 꺾으시고 다른 사람을 세워 그를 대신하게 하시느니라

sentences.original_text: He does not have to ask them anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 아무것도 물어볼 필요가 없습니다
